word:
What a terrible mistake for a professed Christian to devote to himself all his time and means and energies! All are to deny themselves, that they may follow Christ. Many souls have not refrained from accepting martyrdom for the sake of Christ. For them is the blessed promise, "He that loseth his life for My sake shall save it unto life eternal." (Matthew 10:39) 


                               (Signed) 


                                         Ellen G. White 


             (From Doctor Paulson's Collection)
